import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import ProductItems from '../../components/productItems/ProductItems' import { showFavorites } from '../../features/fav/favSlice' function Favorites() { const favItem = useSelector(showFavorites) const items = favItem.map((item, idx) => { return (
toggleFav(idx)}>
{item?.eco ?
: null} {item?.spicy ?
: null}

{item.title}

{item.weight} g {truncate(item.desc, 55)}
) }) return (
{items}
) } export default Favorites
